description:
- Return to ash... -
Kamui is overpowered by Romeo`s onslaught.
Napoleon takes the full brunt of Himiko`s strike shot.
Even with the odds against them, Akira and Aoi continue fighting.
They gather their strength for one final push, all for the sake of meeting Haruma again.

titles.title: Kami no Yaiba to Akuma no Juukou
